Container.Name: rarflixtools
Container.Description: RARflixTools is intended to work alongside a plex media server install to supplement the client experience of plex running on the private roku channel RARflix.[br] https://forums.plex.tv/index.php/topic/91896-rarflixtools-supplemental-tools-for-rarflix/[br] https://github.com/ljunkie/RARflixTools[br] [b]/config[/b] : This is where rarflixtools will store it\'s configuration.[br][br]
